Package decoworld.model.sound

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Effect  
    SoundCollection
    Store a collection of sounds used for singular purpose This will allow for variety when playing sounds consecutively or often
    SoundManager
    Manages all sound events in DECOWORLD Allows creation and manipulation of: Track objects background music atmospheric overlays Effect objects player effects object effects environmental effects
    Track
    A track is a representation of a streamed audio file from hard disk It makes great use of many libGDX functions but has been adjusted greatly to suit the purposes of the DECOWORLD project A track can either be played singly or as part of a collection [SoundCollection]
